description: From Late Latin nosocomīum (“hospital”) +‎ -al, from Ancient Greek νοσοκομεῖον (nosokomeîon), from νόσος (nósos, “disease, illness”) + κομέω (koméō, “to take care of”).

entries.meaning: (medicine, chiefly of infections or their causal agents) Arising from hospital treatment or environment.
(uncommon) Of, relating to, or happening in a hospital.
examples: After this, I applied a bandage […]
